meanings.definition: Grown or growing inward or into the flesh
meanings.sent1: The ingrown hair caused discomfort on his skin.
meanings.sent2: She had an ingrown toenail that needed medical attention.
meanings.sent3: The ingrown plant seemed to be exploring the inside of the pot.
meanings.sent4: The ingrown tree roots hugged the earth tightly.
meanings.sent5: The ingrown thorn pierced deeper into the skin with each step.
